channel.title: Bank Tab
channel.description: I was wondering if it was possible to make a tab that opens up the bank when you click it. (like when you click the inventory backpack it goes to the backpack) but i want it to load the bank interface and not just show up in the side bar. i attached a pic to help explain myself

item.title: Bank Tab
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Find something like disâ€¦

		setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);

and under you should seem something like dis

setSidebarInterface(1, 3917);//tabs setSidebarInterface(2, 638); setSidebarInterface(3, 3213); setSidebarInterface(4, 1644); setSidebarInterface(5, 5608); if(ancients == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); setSidebarInterface(7, 12855); } if(ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); setSidebarInterface(7, 1151); } setSidebarInterface(7, 12855); // what is this? setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); setSidebarInterface(11, 904); setSidebarInterface(12, 147); setSidebarInterface(13, -1); setSidebarInterface(0, 2423);
Change one of those second numbers to the bank id, sorry im not sure which is which you will just have to test but i can tell you the bank id is 5292

Read full topic
